original_text:
In the evening, sudden terror!
    Before the morning, they are gone!
This is the portion of those who loot us,
    the lot of those who plunder us.
korean_text: 보라 저녁에 두려움을 당하고 아침이 오기 전에 그들이 없어졌나니 이는 우리를 노략한 자들의 몫이요 우리를 강탈한 자들의 보응이니라

sentences.original_text: Before the morning, they are gone!
This is the portion of those who loot us,
the lot of those who plunder us.
